bibl.title: Antony and Armenia.
Transactions and Proceedings of the American Philological Association

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Preparations for the Parthian war. - 3. Armenia on the eve of the Parthian war. - 4. The Median and Armenian campaigns. - 5. Assessing the Armenian venture. - 6. The donations of Alexandria. - 7. Antony's view of the situation. - Appendix: the accession date of Artaxias II. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Lee E. Patterson, Antony and Armenia.
